Articles.Content:
I have finished installing the " light " Firefall system onto my Gideon Mkiii

Meaning I have 4 ships with Firefall emplamented into the ship.

Firefall? What system is this?

Firefall? What system is this?

You just now noticed I have been talking about my new weapon system. Wow

Let's just say your capital ships won't enjoy it

You just now noticed I have been talking about my new weapon system. Wow

Let's just say your capital ships won't enjoy it

no i noticed but now that it's implemented...

no i noticed but now that it's implemented...

http://static.squarespace.com/static/51aae414e4b013f5da4a816c/t/53345e72e4b09fffc70d3444/1395940979168/

I think it's time to reveal it.

Give me a few minutes to get home and take pics

This is what makes the missile so deadly.

Structural plates have an impact tolerance of 80 m/s,It got those speeds in atmosphere and in under a minute.

Imagine what it would do to a Drek at 2.5Km.

This is what makes the missile so deadly.

http://i.imgur.com/d4ZUHRu.png

Structural plates have an impact tolerance of 80 m/s,It got those speeds in atmosphere and in under a minute.

Imagine what it would do to a Drek at 2.5Km.

yeah, but good luck hitting the broad side of Bop with something like that...

Ok, got persist, going for it!

yeah, but good luck hitting the broad side of Bop with something like that...

Is that a challenge?

Is that a challenge?

http://i.imgur.com/cwMyobp.png

lol

Anyway, I decided the Carrier Inquisition had to go.

One LFM to the bridge knocked her out.

the hull is uncontrollable, an the cockpit is drifting in space.

You might want to pick the pilot up later, if he survives that long.

persist: https://www./?jvky8361z65arv4
But, Nobody expects the inquisition.

But, Nobody expects the inquisition.

I'd expect as much...

Ok, i have some working crafts, this is the rules for a battle if anyone feel like it:

(NOTE: Im new, my ships barely work and i will be gone during the weekend)

4 Ships

2 fighters around 30-50 tonnes (Mine are 43 tonnes each) ~Almost 180 parts each for mine

2 Whateverclassitshouldbecalled 120-140 tonnes (mines 135 each) ~550 parts each for mine

No refueling / re ammo (exept using stuff from destroyed ships)

Anyone to accept this should be nice, and will also choose location and set up the persistance.

Bear in mind im new!

If no one else will, i'll do it, because i have some 57 ton fighters and 77 ton destroyers. But i'm in the middle of three battles, so you'd have to wait for me to finish at least one.

I'm doing the final test runs of Firefall

Be hope y'all r ready

Once I finish w/ Zekes, I'll battle you. Be warned, I tend to go overkill on shooting up certain ships I deem to be a serious threat to my fleet(s).

Thanks Zekes, also remember this?

We, the artezians would like to request an millitary allience. With some rules

1: We HAVE to help eachother if we get attacked

2: If we attack someone else we MAY help eachothers.

3: You cannot have an allience with any kind of non democratic nation,

-Artezians council.

If this is rejected we propose a trade route between our countries. I will only sell wares trough planes thou so if you dont have any airports we cant trade.

United Redosia Accepts! And we wish to go ahead with the trade route too!

Thanks Zekes, also remember this?

United Redosia Accepts! And we wish to go ahead with the trade route too!

Stay away from that, for everyone's sake. No RP here please.
Oh sorry, i didnt intend to RP, just to quote something that happened.

Oh sorry, i didnt intend to RP, just to quote something that happened.

I know, it's best to stay FAAAAAAAAR away from it BUt it looks like scriptkit3h wants to battle you.

Setting up an intercept

Target sighted.

Negative contact.

rocketscientist, what did you do? Any damage?

EDIT I see, missed. Taking turn now.

Scriptkit3h, sure, but keep in mind i will be gone suturday and sunday morning (GMT+1)

Ok, that's fine. I don't have the most helpful schedule either.
I'm going on a scout camp. We're going to make a huge fire and watch some monty python films (among others).

Haha, peice of cake. Dreadnaught is dead. Hit the Bridge, killed the whole crew, and now the hull is uncontrollable.
